contentList.content: College of Bae'Qeshel
The College of Bae'Qeshel is a small but growing society of Dark Minstrels that originated in the Underdark and is primarily practiced by Drow worshippers of Lolth.
Aria of Discordance
Release a cone of sonic force that pushes away all creatures and objects and does Thunder damage.
Deals an additional [1] [2] damage for each Bardic Inspiration charge used.
Dark Minstrel's Lullabye

Expend one or more inspiration dice to attempt to inflict additional poison damage equal to the result of the inspirational die roll(s). If you spend more than two dice you also have a chance to poison your target for 1 minute.
Disarming Trill
When you hit a creature with a spell or melee attack you can add an inspiration die roll to your damage and have a chance to Disarm the target.
Hymn of Intimidation
When you hit a creature with a spell or melee attack you can add an inspiration die roll to your damage and have a chance to Frighten the target until the end of your next turn.
Lyric of the Lingering Laggard
When you hit a creature with a spell or melee attack you can add an inspiration die roll to your damage and slow the creatures movement for 2 turns.
Sonic Riposte
Retaliate with a thunderous strike when a creature misses you with a melee attack. Damage equal to a roll of your inspiration die plus your Charisma modifier.
Provoking Chorus
Shielding Melody
Receive a bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> equal to your max inspiration die roll until the end of your turn.
Song of the Whimpering Strike
<LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
Target receives <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on its next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
Verse of the Vigorous Champion
Choose a friendly target to give them temporary hit points equal to your max inspiration die roll.
Granted temporary HP by a friendly combatant's rallying cry.
Siphon of the Dark Whisper
You draw on the music in your soul to fuel your Bae'Qeshel magic which restores your Bardic Inspiration.
